description: California’s latest A.I. bill is null and void, but efforts to regulate A.I. are still moving forward.
title: How Will A.I. Regulation Move Forward in the US After California’s SB 1047 Veto?

description: Her new work captures subtle shifts of light, space and color, translating fleeting physical sensations and spiritual vibrations into multisensory experiences.
title: Navajo Artist Emmi Whitehorse’s Symbolic Landscapes Offer a Path to Reconnection With Nature

description: The new miniseries is pulpy and plot-packed, and it's sure to be your newest TV obsession.
title: ‘Disclaimer’ Review: Alfonso Cuarón’s Thriller Is Must-See TV

description: The artist's rhetoric of literality and resistance to obfuscating the viewer won’t explain away the obviousness of “Social Media,” but they’re not meant to.
title: At Lisson Gallery, Josh Kline Presents the Spoils of a Social Media Ransacked World

description: Steve McQueen—a director who understands we can only look forward by looking back—gives us a new lens through which to examine WWII in this masterful film.
title: BFI London Film Festival Premiere: Steve McQueen’s ‘Blitz’

description: For me, when someone comes to order, it’s like they’re coming to my home," chef Vania Ghedini tells Observer. "I think of it like when the grandchildren come home, and the grandmother just wants to feed them.”
title: At Venice’s Hotel Cipriani, Chef Vania Ghedini’s Menu Is a Taste of Italy

description: "It seems that at this moment in the world inundated with “social" media, we have become less sociable."
title: Rirkrit Tiravanija’s Latest Show in London Tackles Disillusionment and Political Polarization

description: The philanthropist plans to dole out millions to organizations working to improve the physical and mental health of women.
title: Melinda French Gates Launches a $250M Open Call to Bolster Women’s Health

description: Even when you know where this story is going, the opera drags you into its undertow.
title: ‘The Listeners’ Offers a Chilling Take On Disillusionment and American Despair

description: The future of artificial intelligence isn’t just being built in research labs—it’s being shaped by a small circle of power players who control the capital, strategy and vision of the industry’s biggest breakthroughs. From tech executives to investors and policy architects, these leaders are determining what A.I. becomes, what it prioritizes and how it impacts society. Meet the movers who are deciding the direction of the world’s most transformative technology.
title: Masters of the Machine: The A.I. Leaders With Power, Influence, Capital and Vision

description: Escaping the coastal hustle and bustle of L.A. can be accomplished in under three hours, whether you’re looking for charming mountain towns like Big Bear and Idyllwild or vast desert retreats like Joshua Tree.
title: The Fall Escapes Just a Short Road Trip from Los Angeles
